title: Yobox-由YOGCAST整合多個有用Mod(手打+原創)
author: klamben
txt_content:
本帖最后由 klamben 于 2011-8-4 18:41 编辑 






yogbox.png (9.06 KB, 下载次数: 177)

下载附件

2011-8-4 16:57 上传





Changelog Version 1.7.3 Beta 7
- Added Doors Open Doors tweak. Double doors are 100% awesomer!
- Added Inventory Tweaks by jimeowan. Broken tools get replenished (if you are holding more), as do stacked items! Middle clicking or pressing R (by default) sorts your items!
- Updated mods that needed them. (Hopefully no more transparent mobs from Elemental Creepers!) Also be on the lookout for slime pools!
- Removed Israphel for sure this time, as it's bugged at the moment.

Version 1.7.3 Beta 7
Here's a list of all mods currently included in this pack:
mods marked (CORE) are part of the core installation


=====
Inventory Tweaks by jimeowan
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/...s-120-july-27/
-----
Tweaks inventory handling. Tools/weapons when broken get instantly replaced with another, organized items. R key (by default) or middle mouse click sorts inventory.

=====
Doors open Doors tweak by Kassoon (CORE)
http://forums.somethingawful.com/sho...#post393496394
-----
Doors open doors adjacent to them. Meaning double doors will both open at the same time. Very handy. 

=====
Proper Fence Behavior by nekosune (CORE)
-----
Makes mobs not act all derpy around fences. :3

=====
Seasons by Nandonalt
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/...e-seasons-mod/
-----
Adds seasons to your world. Each season changes in 7 Minecraft days and each has their own special properties. Also includes recipes to make a season watch and thermometer.

=====
Pfaeff's Mod (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/...-pad-and-more/
-----
Adds useful redstone activated blocks and a slime jump pad!

=====
Elemental Creepers by xSmallDeadGuyx
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/...sssssssssssss/
-----
Adds Creepers of varying types with different attacks. Not all are bad....

=====
Millenaire by Kinniken
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto...=1032&t=247048
-----
Adds NPC villages to your world. Read the enclosed Beginner's Guide PDF for more info! Or visithttp://millenaire.wikia.com

=====
Axebane's Mods (Mystic Ores & Mystic Ruins)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/...mystic-stones/
-----
Mystic Ores - Adds new ores to newly generated chunks with respective tools to be crafted from them. Includes other gems and secret recipes as well.
Mystic Ruins (CORE) - Adds under(and sometimes over)ground ruins and hanging vines. May include secrets too.

=====
Baby Animals by cocoavalley
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/...ls-v175-mobml/
-----
Adds cute baby animals which you can raise and tame. :3

=====
Scokeev9's mods (BiomeWater, ScotTools & Randomite) (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/...t-v18b-6-more/
-----
BiomeWater - Enables biome colored water, mainly for aesthetics
ScotTools - API and fix for better compatability between new blocks from mods and tools
Randomite - Adds new ore, Randomite, which gives you a random ore when mined.

=====
Somnia by MALfunction84
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/...tes-the-world/
-----
Adds advanced sleep options and simulated real time while sleeping. Right clicking on a bed while holding a clock will allow you to set your time to wake up.

=====
More Health by nohero (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto...?f=25&t=122510
-----
Renovates the default Minecraft health system to that like from the Legend of Zelda series of games. Default starting health is 5, and may be changed under mod options. Find heart containers and pieces scattered throughout the world in dungeons. Craft 4 pieces like a workbench to create 1 container. There may be other, secret, ways to acquire containers...

=====
ModOptions API by Clintonxa (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto...=1032&t=207630
-----
This enables GUI style option buttons in Minecraft. Certain mods depend on this.

=====
GUI API by Lahwran (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto...pi#SettingsAPI
-----
This enables GUI style option buttons in Minecraft. Certain mods depend on this.

=====
Mo' Creatures by DrZhark
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?t=86929
-----
Adds a plethora of new mobs and related items to the game world. Advanced settings are under options.

=====
DaftPVF's mods (Slime Boots, Score, Starting Inventory, Treecapitator, Crystal Wing, Web Generation) (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto...=1032&t=132377
-----
Slime Boots - Craft slime **** into boots, said boots double jump height and reduce fall damage!
Score - Pretty self explanatory. Killing hostile mobs gives positive scores while killing peaceful mobs are negative.
Starting Inventory - Starting a new game gives you predefined inventory.
Teecapitator - Trees are tougher to cut, but cutting them with axes at the root makes all the logs fall at once.
Crystal Wing - Craftable item. Using this item instantly warps you to your last spawn point. Has 8 uses.
Web Generation - Generates Webs in caves and underp****.

=====
Risugami's Mods (ModLoader, AudioMod, Death Chest, Shelves, More Stackables, More Arrows, Recipe Book) (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?t=80246
-----
ModLoader - Pretty important as 90% of the mods in this pack won't work without it!
AudioMod - Certain mods depend on this.
Death Chest - Dying while holding a chest in your inventory will place all your items in said chest.
Shelves - Craftable shelves which are great for displaying and storing your prized items.
More Stackables - Enables more items to be stackable for balancing reasons.
More Arrows - Adds elemental arrows and a homing bow.
Recipe Book - Right clicking while holding this opens the book. Shows all available recipes in the game, including mod items!

=====
Airship (CORE) and sky pirates by Pchan3
http://www.steam-craft.com
-----
Adds craftable and ridable airships! They require coal as a fuel source, and are also able to fire regular arrows. While boarded on an airship press B to open the ship's inventory to load it with arrows, coal or whatever else you desire. Pressing C while flying fires arrows. Space ascends, shift descends. Sky pirates is an optional mob mod of hostile airships.

=====
Hogofwar's Mods (Magical Bone Sticks, Bone Torch, Biome Caves, More Dungeons, Rope!, Peaceful Pack) (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto...=1032&t=206974
-----
Magical Bone Sticks - Adds 3 different craftable magic wands with different effects and passive abilities while held. Must be crafted with gilded bone sticks first. Check your recipe book on how to create them.
Bone Torch - Adds torches crafted from bones and coal. Brighter than regular torches, and useful for when you're underground without any wood or sticks.
Biome Caves - Adds ice and sand caverns for more variety on your spelunking adventures.
More Dungeons - Adds above world dungeons which are camoflauged by trees and pyramids.
Rope! - Adds craftable ropes which are useful for climbing. Attach a rope to a ceiling and it will drop down until it hits a surface. Break the rope to get it back or cut it with a sword or axe to make specified lengths of rope.
Peaceful Pack - Adds alternatives to obtain various resources on Peaceful mode which would otherwise require killing of mobs.

=====
Buried Treasures by Club559 and NCrawler and Pudding Huxtable (CORE)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewto...=1032&t=164228
-----
Adds treasure chests scattered throughout the land buried in sand. Can also be found in the nether. Chests may also contain heart pieces or containers...

=====
ConvenientInventory by Evenprime
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?t=162534
-----
Adds SHIFT, CTRL and ALT modifiers for inventory management. Middle clicking in an inventory will sort all items.



內有多個Mod(*為核心Mod)(#為可選安裝)


*Doors open Doors tweak by Kassoon
開門一開二


*Proper Fence Behavior by nekosune 
.......


#Seasons by Nandonalt
季節

*Pfaeff's Mod 
增加風扇等東西


#Elemental Creepers by xSmallDeadGuyx
增加爆水/火的creeper


#Millenaire by Kinniken
不作介紹了


#Axebane's Mods (Mystic Ores & Mystic Ruins)
隨機chest

#Baby Animals by cocoavalley
不作介紹了


#Mo' Creatures by DrZhark
不作介紹了


*DaftPVF's mods (Slime Boots, Score, Starting Inventory, Treecapitator, Crystal Wing, Web Generation) (CORE)
分數

*Airship
飛船


*Hogofwar's Mods
+骨&骨Torch


*Buried Treasures by Club559 and NCrawler and Pudding Huxtable
隨機chest


安裝方法(看7樓):
壓之後放在安裝目錄
按YOGBOX Installer.jar
選要的Mod
ok!!

下載地:http://u.115.com/file/e6kzqln6#



手累了...


你們會回帖是把.........
